3个链接响应速度不一样，可见存在SQL盲注漏洞！呵呵   漏洞证明：  
---Place: GETParameter: appid    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: appid=330051' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'xRsl'='xRsl&host=admin5.com---
